content.question:
The table below shows the landscaping productivity of Simone and Irina during an eight hour workday with the same amount of resources. Simone can mow twelve lawns or trim twenty-four trees in eight hours. Irina can mow nine lawns or trim twelve trees in eight hours.

Number of Lawns Mowed
 Number of Trees Trimed

Simone
 <math alttext="12" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>12</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="24" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>24</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

Irina
 <math alttext="9" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="12" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>12</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

Based on the information in the table, which of the following is true?

choices.label: Irina has an absolute advantage in mowing lawns.
Irina has an absolute advantage in trimming trees.
Irina has a comparative advantage in trimming trees.
Simone has an absolute advantage in trimming trees and mowing lawns.
Simone has a comparative advantage in trimming trees and mowing lawns.

content.answer: Simone has an absolute advantage in trimming trees and mowing lawns.
